title: Ashley & Jared on Love, Marriage, and What Comes Next
description:
Bachelor Nation’s Ashley I. and Jared take a walk down memory lane with Becca and Rachel. Ashley recalls how she felt love at first sight when meeting Jared in “Paradise.” They also reveal the best and worst parts of wedding planning, and how newlywed life is treating them.

Plus, Ashley and Jared discuss what their future holds.

Be sure to rate and subscribe so you never miss an episode.
